# WEAPON::GET_CURRENT_PED_WEAPON_ENTITY_INDEX

## Parameters
* **PED_INDEX** ped
* **BOOL** doDeadCheck = true

## Returns
* **ENTITY_INDEX**

## Description
<!-- AUTOGENERATED: Remove this line before editing -->
Get the current weapon a character is using - returns if it is usable (i.e. in their hand)
